attributes.action: Rename the UK: The United Kingdom of Great Britain, Northern Ireland and the Oversea's Territories
attributes.additional_details: In recognition of the loyalty the overseas territories have shown, and given the fact that the UK Government is responsible for the Defence of these territories, we should rename the UK's official title to include them. If Scotland get Devo-Max, there would be no difference between Scotland and the Falkland Isles for example (i.e. both would be self governing but UK Government would have responsibility for their defence).
